thread.section_title: Pavillon Nation - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice place
thread.title_full: Nice place - Review of Pavillon Nation, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maria G
title: Nice place
text: It is a small cute hotel in the Bercy neighborhood. Although far from main site-seeing attractions L1 metro around the corner made it easily accessible. The neighborhood is really nice and quite, lots of good places to eat, a Laundromat across the street, metro stop around the corner, and a convenient supermarket 2 mins away. The staff was really friendly and helpful with directions and everything in general. I will definitely go back to this hotel, and will recommend it 100%.
